metadata.title: CVE-2021-29975 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Through a series of DOM manipulations, a message, over which the attackerhad control of the text but not HTML or formatting, could be overlaid ontop of another domain (with the new domain correctly shown in the addressbar) resulting in possible user confusion. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 90.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-29975` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 90.0+build1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '90.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
